summary: Media generator app with web-based image and video search functionality
architectural_notes: Media generator uses web search for both image and video content
No API key requirement - direct web search integration

existing_features.title: Remove API key requirement from image search functionality in MediaDisplay component, allowing users to search for images without authentication
Extend web search functionality to video generation tab in MediaDisplay, enabling users to search for videos from the web based on text queries
Integrate web search as the primary mechanism for all media generation requests in MediaDisplay, triggering automatic web searches when users request images or videos

new_feature_requests.summary: Integrate web search into media generator for both images and videos without API key requirement
